attributes.review: i was so excited to download this app. however, i opened it and it sent police officers to my house and they killed all of my family members. trump also came by for a surprise visit and r*ped me and my dog. then they left me with my family’s dead bodies and went back to the white house. they also decided to light my house on fire on they’re way out. luckily my dog and i escaped. however i can no longer bury my family because they turned in to ashes. needless to say i am very disappointed in this app. would not recommend.
attributes.title: biden 2020

attributes.review: When I downloaded it I started getting a lot of random phone calls and it was making my phone glitch to the point where I had to turn my phone off for 2 weeks I recommend nobody to get this app
attributes.title: This app is the worst app in the world

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my loving orange and kind president✨It wouldn’t let me log into it😔 I just wanted to show some love for my Donald trump but i couldn’t 🧚🏻✨ Everytime i would get on the app it would lag constantly i just don’t think it is worthy in being on the app store☺️
attributes.title: Kept logging me out🧚🏻

attributes.review: right when i downloaded this app i got a bunch of viruses. i clicked on one of them and i saw shreks body with trumps head dancing on the colored people he killed. i closed the virus but it kept popping up. all of a sudden i heard a knock at my door and it was "shrump" dancing on my flower pot screaming kill all colored people. i instantly sent him a 8 ball link and he wobbled off like the crab from futurama. he climbed into the sewer and saw penny wise and ganged up with him. they then proceeded to get all the bad people from horror flims and ate childen.
attributes.title: dont downlaod this app if you dont want kids to die

attributes.review: impossible to use, asks for VERY personal information, crashes constantly, opens other apps without prompting. i can honestly say that if there was ever an app that would be cast into the depths of hell after it died, this is the one 😪
attributes.title: i don’t feel safe with this app on my phone

attributes.review: Worse app there is. I don’t even know why this is on the app store. Should be removed or not be allowed in America... Do not download, I repeat do not download. Asks you for your phone number (an invasion of our privacy) and when it is texts teens it can cause a distraction and lead to car crashes!📲🤳🚘💨🚨🚑☠️☠️
attributes.title: I COULDVE DIED

attributes.review: Opened the app to see a Cheeto😖very traumatic seeing as I’ve been having nightmares about Cheetos for years❌told my boyfriend then he broke up with me saying I didn’t pass the vibe test💔💔🤬im very disappointed on the emotional damage that I was given from this app not happy 😔🤕won’t be coming here to eat next time
attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.userName: manny should be the new flag

attributes.review: this app is absolutely terrible. not only did it take forever to download, but my phone started glitching and i had to totally reset it to get rid of the problem. do not get this at all, it is terrible and i can’t believe the president would make such a horrid app that ruins our phones.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: The app was so horrible and so out of touch I can’t even explain the app wouldn’t even download for weeks and when it did it took all my storage and when going on the app it continued to glitch and make my phone do so as well this is the worst app ever do not download!!!!!
attributes.title: Just.....no🤢

attributes.review: The worst mistake of my life was downloading this app. As soon as I opened it I immediately felt the sudden urge to go to target and speak to a manager. At one point I blacked out and when I woke up I was sharing all lives matter posts on Facebook. Would not recommend, very horrible experience.
attributes.title: Bad vibes
